about_the_game:
The Undertaker and its minions have escaped thanks to his second in command, Denzel. It is up to you to pursue them in maze-like tunnels of the mines beneath Greenhill. Be careful though because there is a reason why the mines have been abandonned...


In the mines, your freedom of movement is limited. Be aware of the landslides and the goblin-driven minecarts!



Thankfully you're not alone in the pursue of the Undertaker, a new band of heroes are joining your ranks:


"I created a monster, it's up to me to make sure it is put down!

Former teacher of the Undertaker, Elias relentlessly pursues him to right his wrongs and put him down.


"Evil only exists to be destroyed!"

Sole survivor of the Undertaker's crimes before he came to Greenhill, Tara has made a pack with a demon in exchange for power.


"..."

Created by the amalgamation of th souls of the Undertaker's victims when he took over Greenhill's Underworld, Chaos exists only to bring the necromancer to hell with it.



That's not all, those new heroes came packing a big ne arsenal for you to try. 30 objects are added to the game, It should help to get through the mines!




Moreover, we've added 17 new achievements for you to overcome and conquer! Get ready!



Additionally, we wanted to share our appreciation for all the support we got since we made Bounty of One available to the public.
Therefore, on the release date of "Bounty of One: Panic in the Mines", an additional character, free for everyone, will be added to the game.


"There is no shame in thinking small."

Inheritor of Greenhill's only Inn, Ernesto was hoping to live a quiet and simple life but the arrival of the Undertaker made it impossible. He has now joined the rebellion against the necromancer and wants to bring him down and go back to his former life.
